mapper.select: SELECT id, session_id, fellow_group_id, primary_student_id, related_student_ids, separation_flag, separation_reason, created_at, updated_at FROM fellow_relation WHERE session_id = #{sessionId} ORDER BY fellow_group_id
SELECT id, session_id, fellow_group_id, primary_student_id, related_student_ids, separation_flag, separation_reason, created_at, updated_at FROM fellow_relation WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fellow_relation ( session_id, fellow_group_id, primary_student_id, related_student_ids, separation_flag, separation_reason, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{sessionId}, #{fellowGroupId}, #{primaryStudentId}, #{relatedStudentIds}, #{separationFlag}, #{separationReason}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE fellow_relation SET session_id = #{sessionId}, fellow_group_id = #{fellowGroupId}, primary_student_id = #{primaryStudentId}, related_student_ids = #{relatedStudentIds}, separation_flag = #{separationFlag}, separation_reason = #{separationReason}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
